summary.span: 代表 物件的已排序集合。

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A具有隱含內容親和性。A has implied context affinity. 如果程序嘗試存取擁有的內容不同的內容從，會擲回例外狀況。If a procedure attempts to access the from a different context than the context of the owning , an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立並新增成員到它。The following example shows how to create a and add members to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增增值是`null`且不會引發例外狀況。Adding a whose value is `null` is permitted and does not raise an exception. 方法也會設定父系-子系之間的關聯性的父視覺效果，也就是擁有者的，和子`visual`。The method also sets up the parent-child relationship between the parent visual, which is the owner of the , and the child `visual`. 如果您需要更低層級控制的自訂類別的視覺子物件的基礎儲存體實作，請考慮使用和方法。If you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects of a custom class, consider using the and methods. 當您使用這些方法時，您必須定義您自己的儲存體實作，而且不會使用。When you use these methods, you must define your own storage implementation, and do not use . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立並新增成員到它。The following example shows how to create a and add members to it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等於，則的容量增加之前新插入。If already equals , the capacity of the is increased before the new is inserted. 如果`index`等於，`visual`新增至結尾。If `index` is equal to , `visual` is added to the end of . 任何現有的視覺效果物件，等於或大於`index`移位，以容納新，而且會更新其索引值。Any existing visual objects that are equal to or greater than `index` are shifted to accommodate the new , and their index values are updated. 方法也會設定父系-子系之間的關聯性的父視覺效果，也就是擁有者的，和子`visual`。The method also sets up the parent-child relationship between the parent visual, which is the owner of the , and the child `visual`. 如果您需要更有效地視覺子物件的基礎儲存體實作的低階控制，請考慮使用和方法。If you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects, consider using the and methods. 當您使用這些方法時，您定義您自己的儲存體實作，而且不會使用。When you use these methods, you define your own storage implementation, and do not use .

span.span: The to remove from the .

summary.span: 從 移除指定的 物件。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移位後面移除的物件的視覺物件，以佔用空出的位置，並更新其索引值。The visual objects that follow the removed object are shifted to occupy the vacated position, and their index values are updated. 如果`visual`已`null`，第一個`null`移除項目。If `visual` is `null`, the first `null` entry is removed. 請注意該移除`null`項目中是線性集合的大小。Note that removing a `null` entry is linear in the size of the collection. 方法也會移除父系-子系之間的關聯性的父視覺效果，也就是擁有者的，和子`visual`。The method also removes the parent-child relationship between the parent visual, which is the owner of the , and the child `visual`. 如果您需要更有效地視覺子物件的基礎儲存體實作的低階控制，請考慮使用和方法。If you need greater low-level control over the underlying storage implementation of visual child objects, consider using the and methods. 當您使用這些方法時，您定義您自己的儲存體實作，而且不會使用。When you use these methods, you define your own storage implementation, and do not use .
